name: Surprisingly Delicate Knights
description: This game was made in seven days for Jame Gam #10 with a theme of 'One Use' and a required feature of 'unstable bridges'.  Surprisingly Delicate Knights is a game about throwing your head against a wall until you can afford to get past it. Create knights, fight monsters, earn money, and ascend through the tower to prove you are the greatest Knightmaster of them all!
